name: TricksOfTrade
description:
Try to carry as much as you can while the rich Merchant is buying recklessly. Be sure to meet his expectations!

The basic strategy is to juggle items without losing them.

This is an Army of One entry.

- Outsourced Content - 
BackgroundNoise => human-crowd-african-market-01
MainMusic => kf020104-for-your-sake
ItemPickUp Sound => user-interface-click-metallic-click-snap-tonal-01
ItemDropSound => user-interface-click-metallic-click-snap-drone-02
 FROM WELOVEINDIES
All of the materials are from MEGASCANS except for Curtains, Glass and CharacterSprites are made for jam.

Item models are from MEGASCANS except for MainMenuScroll, Shisha, Teapot, Turban, CoffeePot, SipOWater and CopperPan are made for jam.

All Buildings are made for jam. Except the castle backplates.

All other sounds were made for my last game and reused here.
